title: Doctor's Portal Online Appointment
description2: => Email and password authentication, Google authentication,
description3: => In the home page, There are banner categories of products, advertise and footer
description4: => User can choose schedule and doctor for his/her treatment by signup in this website.
description5: => User can pay his/her bills online by Stripe.
description6: => An admin can manage all. In admin dashboard an admin can manage all the buyers, all the sellers, and reported items by a buyer and can delete them all. an admin can make a buyer admin.
technology: React | React Router | Firebase | React firebase hook | Tailwind CSS (daisy ui) | React-hook-form | React-icons | React Query | Axios | React hot toast | NodeJs | ExpressJS | MongoDB | JWT |  Stripe

title: UMG MART
description1: => Firstly sets some data of some topics this site (we use loader and also react query to load data from server)
description2: => I also create a separate server from the help of mongodb
description3: => You can see phone details and also booked your favourite product and buy this .
description4: => There are also seller,buyer and admin panel
description5: => seller can add his product to website from dashboard and also can delete his product
description6: => buyer can see the selected product on my order in dashboard and can pay for his product
description7: => Used firebase authentication and JWT token for login register etc.
description8: => admin can remove seller and buyer from server
technology: React | React Router | Firebase | React firebase hook | Tailwind CSS (daisy ui) | React-hook-form | React-icons | React Query | Axios | React hot toast | NodeJs | ExpressJS | MongoDB | JWT |  Stripe

title: Quiz App
description1: => Firstly set some data of some topics for exam(use loader to get data from API)
description2: => You can choose or select any topic that you like.
description3: => There will be provided some question .
description4: => Every question have 4 options and you can choose one of them.
description5: => If you select right option a toast will show you the answer is correct.
description6: => But if you select wrong option then it will show you Incorrect Answer
description7: => There is also a icon right side of every quetion.
description8: => If you click the icon it will show you the correct answer of the question.
technology: React | React Router | Used Github to save code. | Tailwind CSS (daisy ui) | Used Github to save code.| React-icons | Deploy this site on Netlify. | React hot toast
